content: First 1.16.0 bug report was filed, a PHP notice on theme settings pages. @Joseph Flatt Would you be able to check it out? Looks related to color module. :painting:

https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3141

Issue #4399: Added a check so that the color module does not try to m… by hosef · Pull Request #3141 · backdrop/backdrop
…odify the settings form if there are no fields defined.

Thanks for filing that PR @Joseph Flatt :pray: ...I meant to test this (the contrib theme Bootstrap is one that has settings and throws the PHP warnings/errors when visiting its settings page), but there seems to be an issue with the PR sandbox (ZenCi says "request timed out" for the deploy step).
...I was thinking that we could perhaps also sneak https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/issues/4318 and https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4125 into 1.16.1 (the latter as a short-term dirty fix for https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3930)

[UX] Seven theme: Do not capitalize the labels of fieldsets. · Issue #4125 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
This is part of #4124. The most obvious elements that are unnecessarily capitalized are the fieldset labels. We have discussed and fixed this in #3516, for the fieldset that holds the text field fo...
Seven: Fieldset labels overflow container when collapsed · Issue #3930 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug The theme settings headers do not display well as seen in the basis theme. Steps To Reproduce On a fresh site, go to: /admin/appearance/settings/basis Close the TABS AND BREA...

...related: has anyone else been getting this error in their PRs (seems to be happening only with the php70 test)?

Bootstrap: Page cache test (BootstrapPageCacheTestCase)

fail Background fetch copy served after granting access. bootstrap.test:308
fail Access denied page title shown. bootstrap.test:309

Did we break anything with the 1.16.0?
Huh :thinking: ...all tests passed, but that error is there:

This seems like a serious regression: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4400

Text filter configuration is not saved v1.16.0 · Issue #4400 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug Text filter configuration is not saved from the v1.16.0 Test online and localhost Video: https://youtu.be/7Ipohsxs7jo
